properties.name: background
properties.description: Background type option: default | contrast | educational

properties.name: border
properties.description: Border type option: default | primary | secondary | tertiary | quaternary

properties.name: boundingTarget
properties.description: The target that will be used to contain the menu. Can be 'window' or any HTML element

properties.name: closesOnScroll
properties.description: If true, the popover will close on scroll. False by default.

properties.name: isOpened
properties.description: Defines if the popover displays or not.

properties.name: isStatic
properties.description: Defines if the popover is static, which is not dismissible until the trigger is clicked again. Only works on 'click' type.

properties.name: maxWidth
properties.description:
Max width of the popover. The popover will not get larger than this width.
If the popover content is large enough, and the popover has enough space, then the popover will enlarge up to this value.
Is equal to width by default. Takes priority over width.

properties.name: minHeight
properties.description: Min height of the popover. The popover will not shrink lower than this height.

properties.name: minWidth
properties.description:
Min width of the popover. The popover will not shrink under this width.
Used when the popover content doesnt require the full width, or when the popover does not have enough space to display in full width.
Takes width as a value by default. Takes priority over width and max-width.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: Position of popover message {right|left|top|bottom|auto}  Default orientation is auto.

properties.name: pointerPosition
properties.description: Position of popover pointer {center|centerpositive|centernegative|auto}  Default position is center.

properties.name: popoverRoot
properties.description: an HTML element that will triggers the popover

properties.name: positionStrategy
properties.description: The way the popover is positionned relative to the trigger. Default is 'absolute'. 'fixed' appears the same, but ignores overflows.

properties.name: target
properties.description: an HTML element that will triggers the popover

properties.name: width
properties.description:
Width of the popover. 270px by default.
Is used as the minimum acceptable width a popover should have in auto orientation, even if min-width and max-width are defined.

methods.name: close
methods.description: This function is called when popover is dismissed

methods.name: open
methods.description: This function is called when popover is opened

EDSPopoverContent.description:
The **popover** is used to display additional information to the user that otherwise would not appear on the screen. Popover is invoked by clicking or hovering and disappears when the user then clicks outside the elementâ€™s boundaries. The content of a popover contains a greater volume of information than that of a tooltip and could display additional elements such as icons, buttons, links, and tables as well.
Popover width is configurable and is recommended not to exceed 400px.
Content layout within the Popover container is flexible and may accommodate a combination of text, image, form elements, action buttons, etc., based on the functional requirements of the specific application use case.
